descriptionHtml:
Did you ever thought about how cool to have Arvak armored with something more than flames? Have you looked up mods and found that they just added ill-ftting armor to Arvak? Well, look no more!

This mods adds a variety of armors to choose from for Arvak. These armors have been tested in-game as fitting and or close-enough (ie helmet holes are placed over Arvak's eyes, for example):

[list]
[*]Leather Mail (Craftable Barding)
[/list]
[size=3][color=violet]Requirements:[/color][/size]
Requires Dawnguard.
[size=3]
[color=violet]Installation:[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=violet]Compatibility:[/color][/size]
author: Othienka
